alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hamilton County through 545 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Durant Campground, or near Indian Lake, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... Indian Lake, Blue Mountain Lake, Lake Durant Campground, Sabael and Catlin Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
